ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ-Monks@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Guild notes and tunics are now NO DROP... Can t use the old monk-switcheroo trick we used to. ... From: Jeff Price  Reply-to:
ygData.messageBody:
Guild notes and tunics are now NO DROP...

Can't use the old monk-switcheroo trick we used to.

:(




---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: "Jeff Price" <jkprice@...>
Reply-to: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Date: Sat, 21 Aug 1999 12:34:05 -0400

>From: "Jeff Price" <jkprice@...>
>
>Of course you can't. Doing Qeynos headband quests does not give you
>faction with the freeport monks.
>The ONLY way I have found to do this is to actually cheat a little. Start a
>Freeport monk and drop his guildnote somewhere not obvious. Immediately log
>on with your Qeynos monk, pick up the note, and give it to the freeport
>guildmaster of the ashen order. This will give you the faction to start
>doing freeport quests. Personally, I don't like the sashes and headbands
>until you hit red or purple...you are better with a mesh cap and a purity
>belt or thick leather apron.
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
>Sent: August 20, 1999 10:20 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Welcome to EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>
>
>> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>>
>> Ok....im a monk in Qeynos and I chose agnostic. I have the orange
>> headband now and have done the white headband quest over 35 time to gain
>> faction so that I can do the sash quest in Freeport. After doing the
>> quest 35 times i stil cannot do the Freeport quest.
>>
>> Sligo
>> Cazic Thule
>>
